item.title: About
item.description: My name is Ankit Sarkar, Software Engineer by profession. I’m based in Kolkata, India. I have a Bachelor’s degree in Electronics and Communication and around 7+ years of experience working on .NET technologies. In my day job at Tata Consultancy Services (TCS), mainly focused on cloud migration and modernization of legacy applications. This allows me to give various application specific solutions based on Microsoft Azure services for business critical applications.
